Sentencas: All samples were found to retain their original orthorhombic structure after treatment in either oxidising or reducing atmospheres (dry and wet).
Titulo: Structural, thermal and electrical properties of Bi and Y co-doped barium zirconium cerates

Sentencas: Mechanical strength was affected by structure upon reduction due in part to strains and stresses induced by bismuth ionic size variations.

Sentencas: Conductivity values as high as 0.055 S/cm were obtained for sample BaCe0.6Zr0.1Y0.1Bi0.2O3-delta and of 0.0094 S/cm for the Zr-free compound BaCe0.7Y0.2Bi0.1O3-delta at 700 A degrees C in air.
Titulo: Structural, thermal and electrical properties of Bi and Y co-doped barium zirconium cerates

Sentencas: In all the investigated materials, sample BaCe0.6Zr0.1Y0.1Bi0.2O3-delta exhibits the highest conductivity in both air and wet 5 % H-2/Ar with good mechanical strength.
Titulo: Structural, thermal and electrical properties of Bi and Y co-doped barium zirconium cerates

Sentencas: BaCe0.6Zr0.1Y0.1Bi0.2O3-delta is a promising mixed H+/e(-) conductor, a potential component of composite anode for solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Structural, thermal and electrical properties of Bi and Y co-doped barium zirconium cerates
